mil.nga.giat.geowave.core.geotime.store.query

Class SpatialQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.geowave.core.store.query.BasicQuery
      • mil.nga.giat.geowave.core.geotime.store.query.SpatialQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Persistable, DistributableQuery, Query
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IndexOnlySpatialQuery, SpatialTemporalQuery

    public class SpatialQuery
extends BasicQuery
    The Spatial Query class represents a query in two dimensions. The constraint that is applied represents an intersection operation on the query geometry.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class mil.nga.giat.geowave.core.store.query.BasicQuery

        queryGeometry - spatial geometry of the query
        overlaps - if false, the only fully contained geometries are requested

      • SpatialQuery

        public SpatialQuery(BasicQuery.Constraints constraints,
                    com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Geometry queryGeometry,
                    SpatialQueryFilter.CompareOperation compareOp)
        Convenience constructor can be used when you already have linear constraints for the query. The queryGeometry and compareOp is used for fine grained post filtering.
        Parameters:
        constraints - linear constraints
        queryGeometry - spatial geometry of the query
        compareOp - predicate associated query geometry

      • SpatialQuery

        public SpatialQuery(BasicQuery.Constraints constraints,
                    com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Geometry queryGeometry,
                    SpatialQueryFilter.CompareOperation compareOp,
                    BasicQueryFilter.BasicQueryCompareOperation nonSpatialCompareOp)
        Convenience constructor can be used when you already have linear constraints for the query. The queryGeometry and compareOp is used for fine grained post filtering.
        Parameters:
        constraints - linear constraints
        queryGeometry - spatial geometry of the query
        compareOp - predicate associated query geometry
        nonSpatialCompareOp - predicate associated non-spatial fields (i.e Time)
